card.title: List of voting events according to

info.lead: A list of all voting events in the National Assembly, corresponding to user query ({text}), for selected working bodies responsible ({wbs}), sorted by {sortBy}.
text: A list of all voting events corresponding to user query that happened in this sitting of the National Assembly and were published on the dz-rs.si web page.
The results are sorted either by disparity or by date.
